external_games.name: World of Tanks Modern Armor - Damage Under Cover

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Damage Under Cover
summary:
Want to learn how to play hull down? This legendary British tank will get you there! Position the FV201 (A45) behind rocks, ridges, or other forms of cover, and unleash its firepower to support your team.

Damage Under Cover also gives you days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings and the Major "Butch" Alan Commander, a master of subterfuge that you can customize with Skills to optimize your tank's performance.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- British Tier VII FV201 (A45) Heavy Tank
- Major "Butch" Alan 3D Hero Commander
- 30 Days of Premium Account
